00022 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00023 //
00024 #include <cstring>
00025 #include <fstream>
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <string>
00028 //
00029 
00030 #define NUMREADS 20
00031 #define NUMDATA 60000
00032 
00033 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00034 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 void readCelDataSkip(int numFiles, const char *file[]) {
00038   vector<int> ids;
00039   for(int x = 0; x < NUMDATA; x++) {
00040     int index = rand() % 6000000;
00041     ids.push_back(index);
00042   }
00043   cout << "Reading " << ids.size() << " data points." << endl;
00044   for(int i = 0; i < numFiles; i++) {
00045     FusionCELData cel;
00046     cel.SetFileName(file[i]);
00047     cel.Read();
00048     for(int x = 0; x < ids.size(); x++) {
00049       float y = cel.GetIntensity(ids[x]);
00050       y = x;
00051     }
00052     cel.Close();
00053   }
00054 }
00055  
00056 void readCelDataAll(int numFiles, const char *file[]) {
00057   vector<int> ids;
00058   for(int x = 0; x < NUMDATA; x++) {
00059     int index = rand() % 6000000;
00060     ids.push_back(index);
00061   }
00062   cout << "Reading all data points. " << endl;
00063   for(int i = 0; i < numFiles; i++) {
00064     FusionCELData cel;
00065     cel.SetFileName(file[i]);
00066     cel.Read();
00067     int size = cel.GetRows() * cel.GetCols();
00068     for(int x = 0; x < size; x++) {
00069       float y = cel.GetIntensity(x);
00070       y = x;
00071     }
00072     cel.Close();
00073   }
00074 }
00075 
00076 void readCelDataOrdered(int numFiles, const char *file[]) {
00077   vector<int> ids;
00078   for(int x = 0; x < NUMDATA; x++) {
00079     int index = rand() % 6000000;
00080     ids.push_back(index);
00081   }
00082   cout << "Reading ordered data points. " << endl;
00083   for(int i = 0; i < numFiles; i++) {
00084     ifstream in;
00085     in.open(file[i], ios_base::binary);
00086     in.seekg(1000000);
00087     int size = NUMDATA * 4;
00088     char data[size + 2];
00089     in.read(data, size);
00090     if(!in.good()) {
00091       cout << "Read error!" << endl; 
00092     }
00093     for(int x = 0; x < size; x++) {
00094       char y = data[x];
00095       y = 'c';
00096     }
00097   }
00098 }
00099  
00100 
00101 int main(int argc, const char *argv[]) {
00102   if(argc < 3) {
00103     cout << "file-stats - open and read a cel file different ways." << endl
00104          << "usage: " << endl
00105          << "   file-stats mode celfile.cel" << endl;
00106     exit(1);
00107   }
00108   srand(10);
00109   cout << "Doing " << argc - 2 << " cel files." << endl;
00110   if(string(argv[1]) == "skip") {
00111     cout << "Doing skips. " << endl; 
00112     readCelDataSkip(argc-2, argv+2);
00113   } 
00114   else if(string(argv[1]) == "all") {
00115     cout << "Doing read all. " << endl; 
00116     readCelDataAll(argc-2, argv+2);
00117   } 
00118   else if(string(argv[1]) == "ordered") {
00119     cout << "Doing ordered read. " << endl; 
00120     readCelDataOrdered(argc-2, argv+2);
00121   } 
00122   else {
00123     cout << "don't  recognize mode: '" << argv[1] << endl;
00124     exit(1);
00125   }
00126   return 0;
00127 }
